CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: High current modulation is observed with on / off current ratio of 10^6 -10^7 for PzNDTBTBO while PzNDTDTBT shows relatively lower on / off ratio of 10^3 -10^4.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTBTBO |
| PzNDTDTBT |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PzNDTBTBO" and "PzNDTDTBT". These are the names of the materials being discussed in the context of their high current modulation properties.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTBTBO |
| PzNDTDTBT |

In this paragraph, the only two entities that can be clearly identified as "Material Name" are "PzNDTBTBO" and "PzNDTDTBT". These are the names of the materials being discussed in the context of their high current modulation properties. The other terms such as "high current modulation", "on / off current ratio", and the numerical values do not refer to material names and are not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: High current modulation is observed with on / off current ratio of 10^6 -10^7 for PzNDTBTBO while PzNDTDTBT shows relatively lower on / off ratio of 10^3 -10^4.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| High current modulation |
| on / off current ratio |
| on / off ratio |

Explanation:

1. "High current modulation" - This is a property mentioned in the paragraph.
2. "on / off current ratio" - This property is mentioned twice in the paragraph, so I have included it twice in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| on / off current ratio |
| on / off current ratio |

Explanation:

1. "High current modulation" - This is not a material property, so I have removed it.
2. "on / off current ratio" - This is a material property, as it refers to a characteristic of the materials PzNDTBTBO and PzNDTDTBT.
